forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. High near 15C. S winds at 40 to 55 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area early, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 53F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High 11C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 12C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
